author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

Partial backport of  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49227 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/48386/commits/06c85a656212ef0295a8db747b71a4678d41f987
This PR backports the PbPb EW skim to be used for central PbPb skim production of 2023 and 2024 PbPb data.

To be tested with relvals 141.201,141.202

@mandrenguyen
title: [13_2_X] Backport of PbPb EW skim
